data.name: The World Has Changed: Every Mind Matters
data.summary: Questions about humanity, future & the multifaceted changes it will bring in the lives of Indians are hard to cope with. This weekend we emphasise on how do we mentally cope up in times of such uncertainties - as an individual, family, society, employee, employer & corporation?
data.speakers:
Dr. Shelja Sen (Child & Adolescent Psychologist and Family Therapist )
Mrs. Neerja Birla (Founder & Chairperson - Mpower)
Faye Dâ€™souza (Journalist)
